item.title: LookOnChain: Ethereum Surges Above $3,800
item.description: On July 27th, based on HTX market data, Ethereum has experienced a rebound and exceeded $3,800. It is currently trading at $3,815, with a 24-hour increase of 1.14%.

item.title: BiyaPay Analyst: NVIDIA's Market Cap Exceeding $400 Billion Triggers Musk's Amazement, Now Supports Investing in US Stocks Using USDT
item.description: On July 27th, based on the latest data from Statista, NVIDIA has officially closed with a market capitalization of over $4 trillion, thereby becoming the first technology company in the world to break through this threshold. This remarkable achievement has not only propelled NVIDIA to surpass Microsoft and Apple and become the world's most valuable listed company in terms of market capitalization but has also exceeded the combined market capitalizations of Google's parent company Alphabet and Meta. It even surpasses the sum of the market capitalizations of retail giants such as Amazon, Walmart, and Costco.NVIDIA's stock price has surged by more than 1000% in the past two and a half years, delivering outstanding performance. In response to this, Tesla CEO Musk retweeted the relevant news on the social platform X and simply commented: "Wow," expressing his admiration.Driven by the AI trend and capital enthusiasm, an increasing number of investors are eager to seize the growth dividen

item.title: Japanese MUFG Bank is planning to sell tokenized real estate products to investors
item.description: On July 27th, the trust banking arm of Japan's MUFG Bank, Mitsubishi UFJ Trust and Banking Corporation, has purchased a high-rise building in Osaka City for more than 100 billion yen (approximately 6.81 billion USD). The trust bank intends to tokenize the building and sell the digital securities to retail and institutional investors. The product will be provided to institutional investors in the form of a private real estate investment trust (REIT) for life insurance companies.

item.title: Binance will adjust the minimum price precision of some USDT-margined perpetual futures contracts
item.description: On July 27th, Binance will make adjustments to the minimum price movement (that is, the minimum price change) of the following Coin-margined Perpetual Contracts at 07:00 (UTC) on August 1, 2025: LAUSDT, BULLAUSDT, HIFIUSDT, USUALUSDT, HMSTRUSDT, CATIUSDT.

item.title: Public Blockchain Activity Top 7-Day Ranking: Solana Holds Top Position, Ethereum Leads in Growth
item.description: On July 27th, based on Nansen data, the top public chains in terms of active address count over the past 7 days are as follows: Solana (28.18M), BNB Chain (10.14M), Base (7.08M), Tron (5.86M), SEI (3.24M), Aptos (2.89M), Bitcoin (2.80M), and Ethereum (2.50M). Among them, Ethereum's active address count witnessed a growth against the trend by 8.7%, ranking first in terms of growth. Meanwhile, Solana's active address count increased by 1.9%, coming in second in terms of growth.Furthermore, according to Defillama data, in the past 24 hours, the top public chains by DEX trading volume are BNB Chain ($39.3B), Ethereum ($23.4B), Solana ($17.96B), Base ($11.6B), and SUI ($5.3B).

item.title: A whale sold 2,270 ETH at an average price of 3754, realizing a profit of $4.46 million
item.description: On July 27th, according to EmberCN's monitoring, a whale sold 2270 ETH on the blockchain 2 hours ago at an average price of $3,754 and received 8.52 million USDT in exchange. The whale had held the ETH for 4 months and achieved a 1.1x return.Four months ago, the whale purchased and held 3272 ETH through OKX at a price of $1,787. Today, they sold 2270 ETH at a price of $3,754, realizing a profit of $4.46 million from the sale.

item.title: Binance Wallet: Verasity (VRA) Token Airdrop will open at 16:00
item.description: July 27th. The Binance Wallet Official made an announcement. Binance Alpha has now updated the airdrop time of Verasity (VRA) to 16:00 (UTC+8). Users who have at least 200 Alpha points can receive an airdrop of 32,238 VRA tokens on a first-come, first-served basis.

item.title: Binance Wallet: Verasity (VRA) Token Airdrop Delay
item.description: On July 27th, the Binance Wallet official announcement stated that the airdrop of the Verasity (VRA) token, which was scheduled to take place at 15:00 (UTC+8) today, has been postponed. The Binance Wallet is making every effort to ensure that all eligible users receive the tokens as soon as possible. The specific time has not been disclosed yet.

item.title: Binance Alpha has listed Verasity (VRA), open for Points Airdrop redemption
item.description: On July 27th, Binance Alpha launched Verasity (VRA). Users who have at least 200 Alpha points can receive an airdrop of 32,238 VRA tokens on a first-come, first-served basis. If the rewards are not fully distributed, the points threshold will automatically decrease by 15 points every hour.Claiming the airdrop will cost 15 Alpha points. Users must confirm the claim on the Alpha event page within 24 hours; otherwise, it will be regarded as a forfeiture.

item.title: Decentralized Proof of Stake Network Succinct Announces Foundation Establishment
item.description: July 27th - The decentralized proof-of-stake network Succinct declared the formation of the Succinct Foundation. The Succinct Foundation is intended to boost the growth and decentralization of the Ethereum protocol Succinct Prover Network, make the use of ZK more straightforward, and facilitate the connection between requesters and provers.
